participant_1.background:
I was sailing with Jasper and we saw a pod of dolphins.
i enjoy swimming.
I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.
i have broken my arm twice.
i graduated college last week.

participant_2.background:
I would love to have lunch with my sponsor, who has helped me so much on my journey of recovery.
I feel like I'm not living up to my full potential.
i like to create websites.
I do my best to support my family and be there for them.
my major was american literature and education.

content.text: Hey there! What's up?
Not much, just hanging out.  How about you?
I'm doing great! Just got back from a sailing trip.  Did you see any dolphins?
No, I didn't see any dolphins.  I saw a lot of jellyfish though!
Jellyfish are cool!  I like swimming.  Have you ever been swimming in the ocean?
Yes, I have been swimming in the ocean a few times.  It's really fun!
It is!  I love the feeling of the waves crashing over me.  Do you like hot chocolate?
I love hot chocolate!  It's my favorite drink.
Same here!  I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.
Mermaid books?  That's interesting.  I've never read a mermaid book before.
You should!  They're really good.  I just graduated college last week.
Congratulations!  What was your major?
I majored in American Literature and Education.
That's cool.  I feel like I'm not living up to my full potential.  I would love to have lunch with my sponsor, who has helped me so much on my journey of recovery.
That's great!  I'm glad you have a sponsor who has helped you so much.  I do my best to support my family and be there for them.
Thanks!  I know I can always count on them.
That's good to hear.  I'm sure they appreciate it.
Yeah, they do.  I'm glad we got to meet.  It was nice talking to you.
You too!  It was nice talking to you too.
Have a great day!
You too!
